abstract: Stocks decline, erasing gains from rally day before and ending first quarter of 2015 on down note; drop-off comes as traders seize opportunity for profit-taking and portfolio pruning in final day of quarter.
lead_paragraph: As traders looked to close out positions to make their books look as healthy as possible at the end of the quarter, the Dow fell 200 points.

headline.main: Profit-Taking Pushes the Market to a Loss
headline.print_headline: Profit-Taking at Quarter’s End Drives Broad Decline

snippet: As traders looked to close out positions to make their books look as healthy as possible at the end of the quarter, the Dow fell 200 points.
